name: Vespuccia
description:
Retired developer wants to enjoy usual drink in his small world (island called Vespuccia). Help him get the barrels. Fight off all the pesky monsters..

Instructions:

  • WASD - movement
  • Left mouse - attack
  • Mouse Wheel or Q/E - weapon selection (if you have it)
  • Goal: Pick up your rum barrels

Tools used:

  • Unity 5.6
  • Visual Studio Community 2017
  • Paint.NET
